sentences.sContent: It might paralyze me, cause me to forget what I am here for, create so much pain I am distracted, or render me incapable in some other way.
sentences.sContent_eng: It might paralyze me, cause me to forget what I am here for, create so much pain I am distracted, or render me incapable in some other way.
sentences.sCn: 它大概会使我瘫痪，使我忘记我到这里来的目的，使我感到极度痛苦，无法集中意念，或者以其他方式使我丧失能力。

remMethod.val: para(半) + lyz(分开) + e → 身体的一边像是分开了 → 使瘫痪， 使麻痹

words.tran: 使麻痹；使无力；使失去勇气（paralyze的过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 使瘫痪， 使麻痹； 使无效
